An #IWD2018 shout out to every single one of the incredibly brilliant, strong, and powerful women whose badassery has inspired me, lifted people up, and made the world around them a better place to take up space.
You deserve the world.

Today, Ontario's first woman premier announced Canada's first-ever pay transparency legislation & Women's Economic Empowerment Strategy at #ONWomenSummit.
Because the truly incredible women we work with in every sector deserve no less than fair, equitable compensation. #onpoli

Update: Only FOUR members of the Conservative caucus showed up for a vote that they triggered. Shows you how seriously they take their jobs and how much respect they have for the province they want to lead. #onpoli

For a third (!!) time today, a Conservative MPP has moved adjournment during debate on important legislation, wasting 30 minutes (1.5 hours total). The PCs want to govern Ontario, but how can they when they don't even want to work? #onpoli

@MattHelfand Of course not everything is an essential service. My point is you cannot save the money these candidates pledge to save on cheaper pens/unidentified “waste.” Healthcare is 38% of the budget. If you want to save billions annually, you will inevitably touch on essential services.
@alana_kiteley You can!!
I'm 3 for 3! #PCPOLdr #onpoli https://t.co/UrXwNSkhDx

🚨 Not for the first time in this debate, every single #PCPOLdr candidate has reiterated their opposition to working people earning a fair wage for hard work. #onpoli 🚨
@celliottability, @fordnation, @TGranicAllen would NOT proceed with a $15/hr minimum wage.

.@celliottability is literally describing the Ontario Community Infrastructure Fund, which by '18-'19 will provide $300M annually to small, rural, and Northern communities for their infrastructure needs.
It was a Liberal initiative that could get cut by the PCs. #PCPOLdr #onpoli

Live footage of Ontario reacting as the #PCPOLdr candidates talk about hospitals as if they're not going to turn around and cut billions and billions from the healthcare budget: https://t.co/7N690HFlAK

The #PCPOLdr candidates, including the once-reasonable @celliottability, aren't even trying to disguise their admiration for ugly, divisive, empirically unsupported socially conservative policies that hurt and marginalize people. #onpoli

When @celliottability says she would allow free votes on divisive social issues, what she's saying is that she will not stand up for minority communities, including LGBTQ+ Ontarians like me. #PCPOLdr #onpoli https://t.co/pKtCwe1GeT
Here we go. @celliottability leads the pack into the fray on cuts. "Value for money audit" is Conservative leadership candidate-speak for cuts, cuts, and more cuts. ✂️✂️✂️ #PCPOLdr #onpoli
.@fordnation's energy policy—I swear to God—is: "nuclear good, wind bad." This guy hasn't got a clue. #PCPOLdr #onpoli
.@fordnation @celliottability @TGranicAllen are all opposed to green energy, reducing carbon emissions, and fighting climate change. They literally just said so, live on the radio. #PCPOLdr #onpoli

.@celliottability just reiterated her opposition to paying people in Ontario a fair wage for hard work. Christine focused on business profits, but didn't say a word about low-income families putting food on the table. #PCPOLdr #onpoli
@ewilliams0893 @MEPower10 https://t.co/upTrlmbPX5

REMINDER: this section of the debate is about climate change, but all of the Conservatives on stage spent most of their time talking about fighting Justin Trudeau in court.
None of them have a single idea for fighting climate change. #PCPOLdr #onpoli
This is the part of the debate where the PC leadership candidates pledge to fight tooth and nail against any reasonable, viable, tangible measure to tackle climate change. #PCPOLdr #onpoli

Important reminder as the PC leadership candidates face off tonight. Every single candidate on that stage:
☑️ Is opposed to fair wage for working people ☑️ Has no plan to fight climate change ☑️ Has no clue how to afford their platform commitments
